naslov: Okrug Gornji, četiri luksuzne vile u nizu, vrhunski pogled, 1130 m2 (prodaja)
opis: Četiri moderne i luksuzne vile u nizu, novogradnja, u Okrugu Gornjem na otoku Čiovo. Protežu se na tri etaže, s 1.130 kvadrata bruto stambene površine, svaka s prekrasnim pogledom na more. U prizemlju se nalazi ulazni hodnik, dnevni boravak, kuhinja i blagovanica (kao jedna cjelina), kupaonica i stubište, dok se vani prostire komforna terasa s bazenom. Na prvom su katu tri spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice, hodnik i stubište. Drugi kat čini prostrana krovna terasa s nenadmašnim pogledom na more, ljetna kuhinja te WC. Svaka vila je izgrađena od najkvalitetnijih materijala, od stolarije, do pločica, parketa, opreme kupaonice, vrata i prozora s trostrukim staklenim oknima, te bogato opremljena klima uređajima u svakoj sobi, podnim grijanjem u cjelokupnom prizemlju i na katu u kupaonicama (za zasebnom regulacijom svake prostorije), video nadzorom, raskošnom rasvjetom, modernim alarmnim sistemom, video parlafonom i smart-home sustavom. Rezidencije su i u potpunosti namještene. Same vile se nalaze na lagano povišenoj poziciji odakle se pruža sjajan pogled, no istovremeno su vrlo blizu mora, s pravocrtnim izlazom na plažu. Svaka vila ima osigurano parkirno mjesto, odlično je prometno povezana, i ima svu infrastrukturu i dodatne sadržaje u blizini. Vlasništo i papiri su uredni, sve dozvole ishođene i vile su spremne za korištenje i useljenje. --- Four modern and luxurious villas in a row, newly built, in Okrug Gornji on the island of Čiovo. They extend over three floors, with 1,130 square meters of gross living space, each with a beautiful view of the sea. On the ground floor lies entrance hall, living room, kitchen and dining room (as one unit), bathroom and staircase, while on the outside there is a comfortable terrace with a swimming pool. The first floor comprises three bedrooms, two bathrooms, hallway and staircase. The second floor consists of a spacious roof terrace with an unsurpassed view of the sea, summer kitchen and toilet. Each villa is built from the highest quality materials, from carpentry, to tiles, parquet, bathroom equipment, doors and windows with triple glass panes, and richly equipped with air conditioning units in every room, underfloor heating on the entire ground floor and upstairs in the bathrooms (with separate regulation of every room), video surveillance system, luxurious lighting, modern alarm system, video intercom and smart-home system. The residences are also fully furnished. The villas themselves are located on a slightly elevated position featuring a great view, but at the same time they are very close to the sea, with straightforward access to the beach. Each villa has a secured parking space, is well road connected, and has all the infrastructure and additional facilities nearby. The property and papers are in order, all permits have been obtained and the villas are ready for occupancy and use.
